snippet: In the 56-board semifinals at the 14th World Youth Teams Championships on Thursday, there was one very exciting match for American fans.
abstract: Phillip Alder Bridge column on a deal played at the World Youth Teams Championships in Taicang, China.
lead_paragraph: In the 56-board semifinals at the 14th World Youth Teams Championships on Thursday, there was one very exciting match for American fans.
